skincareProducts.name: Turmeric Vitamin C
skincareProducts.description: PERFECT REPAIR, MOISTURIZING TREATMENT: Turmeric + Vitamin C serum is a natural moisturizing & repair formula that helps your skin from inside, recharges your skin. The Serum has aloe vera extract, sodium hyaluronate, Centella Asiatica extract, & sophora Angustifolia extract With nourishing vitamins, turmeric, & other rejuvenating organic natural ingredients, this serum is the perfect anti-aging, moisturizing treatment for your skin.

skincareProducts.name: Retinol 24 Max
skincareProducts.description: This facial moisturizer penetrates the surface of your skin at night to transform your skin with Retinol 24's maximum concentration of hydrators

skincareProducts.name: Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid
ingredient: salicylic_acid, 2% Salicylic Acid (BHA) & Green Tea Extract
skincareProducts.description: Paula's Choice facial exfoliants are gentler on delicate skin of the face & neck than an abrasive face scrub, which can cause micro-tears. A BHA leave-on exfoliator delivers hydration & can exfoliate directly inside the pore & improve how the pore works.

skincareProducts.name: Jade Roller
skincareProducts.description: Face roller-muscle tension relief, reduce facial puffiness and help your skin look fresh; firm your skin and make it look dewy and lifted

skincareProducts.name: Holy hydration
skincareProducts.description: This skincare kit has all of your favorite Holy Hydration necessities- a Holy Hydration! Daily Cleanser, Holy Hydration! Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm, Hydrating Booster Drops, Holy Hydration! Face Cream & Eye Cream.

skincareProducts.name: Moisturizing Cream
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Petrolatum, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Potassium Phosphate, Ethylhexyglycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Disodium Edta, Dipostassium Phosphate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Phytoshingosine, Cholesterol, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Ceramide EOP.
skincareProducts.description: Hylaronic acid moisturizer With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

skincareProducts.name: Collagen
ingredient: hyaluronic_acid, vitamin_e, Retinol, Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid
skincareProducts.description: Fight aging: this anti aging moisturizer face cream has been engineered to help combat the effects of age; our advanced cream contains collagen, retinol and hyaluronic acid to help erase fine lines and wrinkles

skincareProducts.name: Hydro Boost
skincareProducts.description: The unique facial moisturizing gel-cream absorbs quickly, like a gel, but has the long-lasting, intense moisturizing power of a cream, for even extra dry skin. It boosts skin's hydration and locks it in all day

skincareProducts.name: Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion
skincareProducts.description: Aveeno body lotion is specially designed for extra-dry skin to lock in intense moisture and help improve skin's natural moisture barrier; fragrance-free and suitable for all skin types

skincareProducts.name: NAVA
skincareProducts.description: IMPROVES SKIN ELASTICITY - These advanced skincare formulas contain high concentrations of Vitamin C, a nutrient that supports the production of collagen, the structural protein that gives your skin a firm, supple, and “lifted” look and feel.

skincareProducts.name: Eye Cream Organic Silk
skincareProducts.description: Secret Beauty Club Eye Cream Organic Silk Peptides Triple Power – Under Eye Cream Dark Circles And Puffiness and Bags– Dark Circle Eye Cream for Dark Circles and Wrinkles
